A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time seeing the movie\, I thought but it was pretty good. The Star Wars effect wore off and then I went to see it again and all I think was “why?” There are many plot holes once you outline everything and there are new characters that are thrown in the mix that aren’t very thought out (Rose). Not nearly as good as the original trilogy and barely better than the prequels. Disney seems more concerned about selling merch for cute creatures than making a down to earth Star Wars film. Nervous for a whole trilogy from Rian.
